case.state: My name is Alpha, and I'm a virtual idol from Japan! Thanks for inviting me to play!
My name is Alpha, and I'm a virtual idol from Japan! Thanks for inviting me to play!
♫ Hit me baby with ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~! ♫
♫ ~Cards.text~ is the magic number. ♫
I wanna take ~cards.text~.
♫ I wanna take ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~. ♫

This hand should prevent things getting any worse for me!
I could have done with this hand earlier!
I could have done with this hand earlier! Then maybe I wouldn't be standing around with no clothes on!
